name: Emmyrea
overview: Emmyrea is an Adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2001 This is the story of a small country but an incident happened. The King's only daughter Princess Emmyrea are lost. The people suspect of the north country witch - Karakuramu, So who is a courageous choice, that will be up to rescue the princess Emmyrea ! The player will take the role of the knight that will try to rescue the princess and for that he will have the help of some girls: Irini (a woman knight) that is the best friend of the princess, Merian & Lulu. The gameplay is a first person perspective in which the player will have to take decissions that will leaev the story to different places.
